name: Buff ThermoNet Hinged Balaclava - Unisex
description:
Serious coverage for winter shredding or adventures at high altitude. It's wicking and quick to dry, so you won't get chilled when you're working hard.Made of high-loft Primaloft ThermoNet® polyester.Repreve® recycled polyester is made from repurposed plastic bottles.VaporGrid™ mouthpiece allows hot air to escape without fogging goggles.Ponytail opening lets long hair flow freely without bunching.

        Sustainability
